precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', and 'Properties'.

precondition: The right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab's options will be displayed.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button of the 'Screen saver' list box and select 'None'.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will display 'None' as the selected option.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power..." button is visible below the screen saver selection area.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open in front of the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open, and the "Power..." button is visible.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button to the right of the 'Turn off monitor:' setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time intervals to choose from. The currently selected interval will be highlighted.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'Never' option in the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu will close and 'Never' will be displayed as the selected option.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The "Display Properties" window will remain open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
